title: Trend Micro Maximum Security tmusa Time-Of-Check/Time-Of-Use Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privilege on vulnerable installations of Trend Micro Maximum Security. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the processing of IOCTL 0x222813.  The issue results from a time-of-check/time-of-use vulnerability, which allows an attacker to change a field that is being used by the kernel.  An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges to SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/solution/1117509
timeline:
2017-03-28 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2017-06-13 - Coordinated public release of advisory
